title: ViLaCD-R1: A Vision-Language Framework for Semantic Change Detection in Remote Sensing
summary: Remote sensing change detection (RSCD), a complex multi-image inference task, traditionally uses pixel-based operators or encoder-decoder networks that inadequately capture high-level semantics and are vulnerable to non-semantic perturbations.
